title: Friends Video Production premiers interview with Mostofa Sarwar Farooki
body: Friends Video Production — a YouTube based infotainment channel — has premiered an exclusive interview with maverick filmmaker Mostofa Sarwar Farooki recently. Shot at Farooki’s production house in Niketon area of Dhaka and hosted by Nazmus Saquib, the interview is 26-minute in length. In the interview Farooki opened up for the first time on many issues centering his films. He explained the reason to cast noted Bollywood actor Nawazuddin Siddiqui for his upcoming film ‘No Lands Man’. He also took a swipe at his detractors and gave some update on his film ‘Saturday Afternoon’ which is still awaiting a clearance from the censor board.
